text:
Now, Luz, we are technically
in the savage ages,

way before Belos banished
wild magic.
His denizens may be dangerous.

- Aah!
- Good tidings, kind witches.

This doesn't look dangerous.
This looks awesome.

Why did Belos want to banish
wild magic again?

Well, the titan supposedly
doesn't like it.

Oh, my gosh.
Look at this thatchwork!

Each segment looped by hand!
Ooh-hoo-hoo-hoo!

But I bet Flora
would scoff at it.

Excuse me.
Have you seen a human around?
Round ears. Super smart.

Honestly, he's probably
a celebrity around here.

- Uh-uh.
- ( honks )

- Uh-uh.
- Mm-mm.
Mm, nope.
Dance, human! Dance!

- ( laughing )
- Give that back!
I can't believe this.

After the bonds
of fellowship we forged--

Bonds? Hah!
You still owe us.
When I accomplish my mission,

I promise you,
you'll have your snails.

Listen to this.
"With my new and bravest

companion Blue Fang,
I set forth.

His strength should make
fast work of any task."

His pretty little words should
make pretty good kindling.
That doesn't belong to you.
